retrospect there may have been times when more troops could have helped," he writes. But he insists that no formal request for more troops was made by the generals. He says Paul Bremer 's decisions inadvertently stoked nationalist resentments and fanned the embers of what would become the Iraqi insurgency . Donald Rumsfeld had favoured going into Iraq quickly and getting out quickly, handing over power to the Iraqis, but Paul Bremer favoured a slower approach. 36, recently appeared on Jimmy Kimmel Live and spoke about his pal and former American Idol judge Simon Cowell 's upcoming show The X Factor. Asked if he had spoken to Simon Cowell about it, he said: Actually I did hear from him, I spoke to him when he was overseas on a little bit of a break and he didn't comment about the new show. "No he didn't bring up the new show. But he likes to keep his opinions to himself. of fun that he is-insists on carrying the communal experience over into his highly praised live shows, an engulfing mix of multimedia, props, and crowd interaction, all anchored by Rich Aucoin 's own presence. I usually call it crowd karaoke. The whole crowd sings things together, and it's a dance party on top of that. The visuals are all in 3D, so you can stand at the back and just watch the movie that's playing on the screen. I cut up all these movies and I write the music to sync up to the movies that show in the background. The shows have certainly helped with the buzz building around Rich Aucoin ; recently, a misinterpreted Facebook update started a rumour that he would be performing on the Late Show with David Letterman . Continuing to speak on the condition that he gets Kirsten Gillibrand 's home phone number, Waterhouse continued, Well, Joe Lieberman sat down next to Al Franken , who suddenly developed a need to use the men's room and left, so Joe Lieberman then scooched over to Olympia Snowe , who tried to tell him she was holding the seat for Debbie Stabenow . So then he went over to where Jeff Sessions and Mark Udall were and they told him to piss off. The next thing you know, everybody started arguing about who had to sit with him.
